org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.management

Class EndpointDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.management.EndpointDefinition

  • public class EndpointDefinition
extends java.lang.Object
    The end-user level API class to define an Endpoint or a Destination of a Proxy dynamically at runtime
    Since:
    2.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  EndpointDefinition.Address
      Deprecated. 
      use the AddressDefinition instead
      static class  EndpointDefinition.Defaults
      The defaults for the endpoint parameters
      static class  EndpointDefinition.Type
      The enum that defines the possible endpoint types

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EndpointDefinition()
      Constructs an endpoint definition to be embedded into a proxy service
      EndpointDefinition(java.lang.String id)
      Constructs a named endpoint definition that can be referred in proxy services with the given identifier

      • getTimeout

        public int getTimeout()
        Gives the timeout of the endpoint in milliseconds, this might be bound to the transport level timeout if there is any. For example the http transports socket timeout is an upper-bound for the timeouts of endpoints using the http transport
        Returns:
        the timeout of the endpoint in milliseconds

      • setTimeout

        public void setTimeout(int timeout)
        Sets the timeout of the endpoint in milliseconds, this might be bound to the transport level timeout if there is any. For example the http transports socket timeout is an upper-bound for the timeouts of endpoints using the http transport
        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout of the endpoint in milliseconds

      • getKeepalive

        public int getKeepalive()
        Gives the keepalive time of the endpoint in milliseconds, time an idle connection opened to this endpoint should be kept alive for possible re-use
        Returns:
        the keepalive time in milliseconds

      • setKeepalive

        public void setKeepalive(int keepalive)
        Sets the keepalive time of the endpoint in milliseconds, time an idle connection opened to this endpoint should be kept alive for possible re-use

        public java.lang.String getProxyID()
